lines: 1. Nkonyeget' ase Yeso,'S' egekuba kiaye,Gakonyoroki' ogwancha,Nintimok' omoyo.'Gw' eriogi ri'amalaika,Banterera buyaBitii bi' obonene,'Nyancha y'ekerore.
Nkonyeget' ase Yeso,'S' egekuba kiaye,Gakonyoroki' ogwancha,Nintimok' omoyo.
2. Nkonyeget' ase Yeso,Korwa ogwechanda,Korw' amatemwa y'ense,'Bibe mbikombua.Tinkoba n'obororo,'Bwoba, tang'utang'u;Amatemwa make Igo,'Mariga make igo!
3. Yeso, obotamero,Yeso onkwereire,Nimbek' ogosemia,'S' Egetare ki' Emiaka;Nganye ntari korosa,Nd' obotuko boere;Goika ndore emambia,'Gonkiera igoro.
